mapper.select: SELECT dealYear, dealMonth, ROUND(AVG(dealAmount), 2) dealAvg FROM apt_deal WHERE aptCode = #{aptCode} GROUP BY dealYear, dealMonth
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO apt_deal(dealAmount, dealYear, dealMonth, dealDay, area, floor, cancelDealDay, aptCode) VALUES (#{dealAmount},#{dealYear},#{dealMonth},#{dealDay},#{area},#{floor},#{cancelDealDay}, #{aptCode})
select last_insert_id()
